Title: Relates to recovery of certain housing accommodations by a landlord
Summary: Relates to recovery of certain housing accommodations by a landlord; limits a landlord's ability to take possession of units for their own primary residence, permits recovery of only one unit, and restricts such ability if the tenant has occupied the apartment for twenty or more years.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to recovery of certain housing accommodations by a landlord
